description: The code of the core based statistical area (metropolitan area) where the monitoring site is located
name: cbsa_code

description: state name
name: state

description: The FIPS code of the state in which the monitor resides
name: state_code

description: The name of the county where the monitoring site is located
name: county

description: The FIPS County Code where the monitor resides
name: county_code

description: The 4-digit number used to uniquely identify the air monitoring site within a state-county combination or tribal area
name: site_number

description: A qualifier is any note about the data from the AQS qualifiers list that applies to the reported measurement
name: qualifier

description: The total measurement uncertainty associated with a reported measurement as indicated by the reporting agency
name: uncertainty

description: The method detectable limit (MDL) defined for the sample by the QA agency, which supersedes the EPA-defined method detectable limit for the designated methodology
name: detection_limit

description: The unit of measure for all statistics on the same row. Every parameter has a standard unit of measure
name: units_of_measure

description: The length of time that air passes through the monitoring device before it is analyzed (measured)
name: sample_duration

description: The measured value in the standard units of measure for the parameter
name: sample_measurement

description: The Datum associated with the Latitude and Longitude measures
name: datum

description: The angular distance north or south of the equator measured in decimal degrees. North is positive
name: latitude

description: The angular distance east or west of the prime meridian measured in decimal degrees. East is positive, West is negative
name: longitude

description: The frequency at which sample observations are made. Specified as the amount of time that elapses between the beginning of subsequent observations
name: sample_frequency

description: A code representing the units of measure
name: units_of_measure_code

description: This is the Parameter Occurrence Code used to distinguish different instruments that measure the same parameter at the same site
name: poc

description: The AQS code corresponding to the parameter measured by the monitor
name: parameter_code

description: A code representing the Sample Duration. The code does not necessarily correspond to a real world value (e.g., 5 is not for a 5 hour sample duration)
name: sample_duration_code

description: The name or description assigned in AQS to the parameter measured by the monitor. Parameters may be pollutants or non-pollutants
name: parameter

description: A short description of the processes, equipment, and protocols used in gathering and measuring the sample. This field is a concatenation of the method of collection and the method of analysis
name: method

description: A three digit code representing the measurement method. A method code is only unique within a parameter (that is, method 111 for ozone is not the same as method 111 for benzene)
name: method_code

description: An indication of whether the method used to collect the data is a federal reference method (FRM), equivalent to a federal reference method, an approved regional method, or none of the above (non-federal reference method)
name: method_type

description: The date the sample was taken in Local Standard Time
name: date_local

description: local time when sample was taken
name: time_local

description: GMT date when sample was taken
name: date_gmt

description: The number of hours between Greenwich Mean Time and Local Standard Time at the monitor
name: time_gmt

description: indicates when the record was last updated is the source database
name: date_of_last_change

description: The timestamp on which the record is ingested in table
name: ingestion_timestamp
